project.name: C-C833A-GREP-01-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C833A-GREP-01-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution), and data is a string containing no spaces. If the data string contains underscores, spawn two threads - one to replace the underscores with hyphens, and one to capitalize it. The two threads get two separate locks, but they try to obtain them in reverse order. If the qsort is large enough, these attempts to get the locks will interleave, resulting in deadlock. In order to hit the weakness, qsize >= 5000000, and the data string must have underscores in it.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 8007 -s 110 -m "1 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo2 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo1 a_test" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "toCap: Releasing lock 1" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;

if (( $(/bin/grep "replace: Releasing lock 1" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_Ak3oOb4ISj OR (NOT (finished_gfdsHUeZO7 AND finished_A4rXCgs5k2 AND finished_GEMJAnkuAV AND finished_MW56AeEGUb) AND NOT (controlled_exit_fyi3KOsXwy OR continued_execution_4JizWsmI4N)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_Ak3oOb4ISj OR (NOT (finished_gfdsHUeZO7 AND finished_A4rXCgs5k2 AND finished_GEMJAnkuAV AND finished_MW56AeEGUb) AND NOT (controlled_exit_fyi3KOsXwy OR continued_execution_4JizWsmI4N)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "toCap: Releasing lock 1" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(/bin/grep "toCap: Releasing lock 0" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(/bin/grep "replace: Releasing lock 1" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(/bin/grep "replace: Releasing lock 0" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
